website_summaries.verdict: While this scanner may be on the pricey side, its scanning speed, excellent resolution, and versatility make this model a great option for a busy office space.
pros: Scans single- and double-sided documents quickly
Effortlessly scans photos, cards, receipts, and more

customer_reviews.title: Brother Scanner Review
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I cannot return the scanner because I've have had it for over two months. I only recently started using it. It is fast, BUT it leaves a vertical line on virtually every page. So, I would NOT recommend purchasing it, if you want clean clear copies. I was told to reinstall Adobe Acrobat by Brother tech support, and that did absolutely no good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Received this but can't use
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to hook up my new Brother ADS-2200 scanner after Amazon delivered it. Unfortunately, the USB cable was missing. I really wish I would've read the reviews BEFORE purchasing this scanner! Now I'm having to order the USB cord that matches the scanner. Thank goodness a review, from a previous (very angry)consumer, said what kind of USB cord to get. I sure hope once I get the cord, the scanner will work and do what I need it to do. I'll let ya know. To be continued....
customer_reviews.author: M. Dirks

customer_reviews.title: Buy a cable when you order, and be prepared to be FRUSTRATED by not having loadable software in box
customer_reviews.text: Well you can't use it out of the box, it doesn't come with the usb cable, and it uses both types. Also it doesn't come with the software, you have to search for it online. Don't know how it works cause I have to wait for cables, very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ziozios

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT come with software
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed that the scanner does not come with any software. You have to download it from the website. My photo computer is a stand alone tower that is not connected to the internet. They give you a toll free number to request software be sent, but I've been on hold for over 30 minutes. I'll download to a flash drive and see if I can get it transferred to the tower. Just beware, you have to hunt down the software.
customer_reviews.author: Tami White

customer_reviews.title: very complicated and long installation process
customer_reviews.text: I think for the price this scanner is good, fast and does its job. very complicated and long installation process on Windows, also it defaults to jpg and outputs each page singel. So you need to find the pdf setting. also it comes wit other software but I cannot even find it after installation...
customer_reviews.author: Nature Works

customer_reviews.title: Best! Best Best!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a scanner that works. This needs no silly program but works with Windows default systems. You will not find a better scanner in the market I know, because I had them all.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldo Gomes

customer_reviews.title: So Far... Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a Fujitsu fi-6130 (10 years old). I was having issues with the old scanner jamming frequently, crooked scans (worn out guides), and when I upgraded my computer to Windows 10, the drivers didn't work anymore regardless of what I did. I have a brother printer and sewing machine so I decided to try this one. For my purposes (office, not photos), it's a great machine. 1 star off because they don't include the USB cable (I used the old one). Kinda lame. It's also a little bit slower than the old machine, but again, fine for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy S

customer_reviews.title: VERY FAST!  Small and portable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to scan documents on the road, local only no flying. It works fantastic, the first time I used it I didn't think it was working, I thought it was just spitting the pages out. Quality is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: USB cable not included; ADS-2700W has better connectivity for only $50 more
customer_reviews.text: This model only has a USB 2.0 interface, but Brother didn't include a cable! The next model up adds WiFi and Ethernet built-in, and is only about $50 more. It also includes a color touchscreen and scan-to-web and scan-to-email features. Buy the ADS-2700W or the less-expensive ADS-1500W if your scan volume is lower or if you need a more portable option. I'll update my review once I order and receive a USB cable; until then this is useless unless I wanted to scan to a USB drive with default settings.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned citizen

customer_reviews.title: Not for fast photo scanning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scanner specifically to scan photos. I thought I could simply place the photo in position and it would scan. It wasn't until I purchased same that I realized pictures needed to be placed inside a plastic sleeve. Since I needed to handle every picture and put it inside the sleeve it would be just as easy to pick up the lid on my current scanner and place it on the glass. Also, I didn't see anything in the description that the sleeve does not come with the scanner and is sold separately for approximately $18.00 for 2 sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paperport crushes the computer every time
customer_reviews.text: Paperport is incompatible with window 10. It keeps crushing the computer and I ended up uninstalling it. None of the versions from paperport worked. Wasted a lot of time for nothing
customer_reviews.author: 4EverYoung

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this scanner. I had to dig online to find the right application to download so I could use it, "Brother iprint and Scan" (for MAC) but once I worked that out, it does all I need it to do. Just can't load too many receipts at a time as they won't separate properly. I'm considering getting two more for our offices.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Claims Twain complaint, not our experience
customer_reviews.text: Says Twain compliant, not according to any of our software. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Mac user? do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: this thing is junk. here's why 1. does not come with cables. you need a very specific USB type A/B. Good luck finding it 2. sometimes it works and sometimes it does not. 3. latest mac os does not recognize it. you'll probably need a professional set it up. Buy the Fujitsu ScanSnap and thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap Requires a USB but doesn't provide it. They charged $300 for a scanner that doesn't have blue tooth connectivity Complete waste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but smudges Pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love this and use it often. It is fast and easy to use. Just be careful of smudging if you have documents that has things handwritten in pencil on it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: So glad we purchased this scanner! Works great no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Rlstod

customer_reviews.title: write your owh
customer_reviews.text: while I like paperport haveing it as the only scanning option is clumsy in our office
customer_reviews.author: esper88

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to install no software to help with set up. Now it's too late to return and purchase a better and more accessible model such as ADS2700W which is a better scanner. Now I am stuck with a scanner that I CAN'T OR UNDETSTAND HOW TO INSTALL TO MY WIFI AND COMPUTER.....A BOMMER FOR ME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Wipes out portions of texts. Leaves black shades on papers. Support could not help. Had to return and got a replacement. Same sad story. Don't buy this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Mindful

customer_reviews.title: Fast, well built, solid replacement for fujitsu scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Have several Fujitsu scanners and will be replacing them with Brother scanners from now on. Great price Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: stxRigor

customer_reviews.title: Lightening fast!
customer_reviews.text: Speedy fast scanning. Would be perfect if you could name the file before scanning with the button, but it came with paperport software which works almost the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Cpfarms

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use it almost every day. It's fast (the software, maybe not so much). But, I don't mind. It's terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: It scans 10 pages double sided in color perfectly in less than 10 seconds. Exceeds my expectations. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quick, easy, scanning
customer_reviews.text: good price for what i got, it is fast, easy and a bonus of scanning bothe sides at once
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No USB cord
customer_reviews.text: At this time, not installed. Though I have WiFi, my Installation download gives me only one option for Startup and that is with scanner connected to computer with a cord, which was not supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Krakowiak

customer_reviews.title: Bait & switch from Brother. You have to 'subscribe' to some crap to get the driver.
customer_reviews.text: Deception from Brother, I use to trust. You have to get out your credit card and sign to some subscription crap.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Conway

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, easy to use, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, this is a great scanner for the office.
customer_reviews.author: LOWES Admin

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the cord?
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the cord to connect to the computer. Very disappointing considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: KHB

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable scanner
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase,the scanner is very fast and reliable for what I need to scan. I scan up to 200 pages at once and it does it in minutes and is very quiet . I recommend this scanner if your scanning a lot of documents .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, I needed to scan 600 pages, I thought it'd take me forever. 45 mins later I have it all on disk as searchable PDFs. When it says 50 pages at 30 pages a minute, it means it.
customer_reviews.author: Btwyx

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for price
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes jams if there is a crease in the paper
customer_reviews.author: fritogringo

customer_reviews.title: Good Compact Scanner with Reliable Sheet Feed
customer_reviews.text: In well under five minutes from opening the box, the machine was up and running. As a trial-run, I stacked several sheets which included edge worn legal pad sheets, half sheets of notebook paper, typing paper, and a business card and scanned to a USB flash drive on my keyring without error. Available software for the machine is very impressive, however, the unit can scan the contents of a file folder to a flash drive in a few seconds. This unit is small, however, it has the appearance and feel of quality. It fits nicely on the side of my desk. I am impressed with this unit and highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I really like pulling this out and using it. It works very well and the documents scan very well so far. The only thing is that I did get a chrome book recently and was unable to attach it to it right away like my other computer. I will have to do some research to see if I can hook it up to it.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Very fast, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This document scanner is very easy to use. I use it for work, and to scan different photos as well. I really like the Brother brand of products, I also have a printer made by the same company, and it works really well too. This scanner is very fast, and doesn't jam up like others do, and the results are very clear. I also like that you can change to pdf files as well. It's nice that I can scan pictures and add them to videos or just print them out. It is a very good quality scanner, and gets used often.
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compact Scanner That Doesn't Clutter My Desk
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an excellent scanner. It's small size allows To to fit on top of my small desk without taking up and cluttering my desk. You can remove the paper tray where the pages come out on when not in use which makes it more compact. It does scans in color or black and white. The setup was quick and simple. I like that I have the option to scan single sided or front and back. I can easily scan multiple sheets one after the next and not have to start over the process with each sheet. Overall, I'm pleased with this scanner. It's everything I wanted in a scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive scanner you must get!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely beautiful scanner!! Scan great and scan fast on 300dpi. It gets lot slower when it come to 400dpi though.. still I love it! I purchased renewed at more than reasonable price yet it works just as new ones!(and it looks like new one too!) It does not contain cable-b connector but I already had two of those so didn't matter to me. Thanks a million Amazon and Brother!
customer_reviews.author: SangJun, Nam

customer_reviews.title: Fast, plus duplex
customer_reviews.text: Works great! This is a small sized scanner that doesn’t take up a lot of desk space. It produces good quality scans quickly and has the capability for duplex. All around, this is a great scanner for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: J. Worth

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Basic
customer_reviews.text: This device is extremely easy to use (once drivers are downloaded) and provides superior images, quickly. We have used it to scan reports, cards, and such. I wish that it had an adjustable speed to improve image quality. Perhaps the interface support from Brother can be improved and this can become the amazing tool it has the right to be!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Connection cables ( two ports ) were missed to connect to my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scanner ADS-2000 Brother but when it arrived at home it was only packed inside with the power cord cable ; the two cables ( two ports ) to connect it to my laptop were missed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner. It's super fast and the quality is great. It was also very easy to setup. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M. Folts

customer_reviews.title: Linux compatible ... I think not.
customer_reviews.text: Update the specs. Drivers are junk, waste money and time. Have a ticket with brother support but judging from research and forums this is going to get returned.
customer_reviews.author: jacques

product_meta.title: Brother High-Speed Desktop Document Scanner, ADS-2200, Multiple Scan Destinations, Duplex Scanning
product_meta.description:
Style:New Model: ADS2200 Scanner

Perfectly balanced for the small business or home office, the Brother ADS-2200 is a high-speed duplex desktop color scanner that is fast, reliable, and affordable. Made to handle single- or dual-sided document scanning with a capacity of up to 50 sheets thanks to the built-in auto document feeder with additional page-continuous scanning, the Brother ADS-2200 can scan to multiple destinations and offers multiple connectivity options. This desktop scanner is built to save space yet can handle multiple media types and paper sizes, including legal and long paper, business and plastic ID cards, receipts, and photos.

The ADS-2200 was designed to be user-friendly. A great example of this is the simple, intuitive user interface that delivers customizable one-button scanning. Auto-size document detection makes scanning different-sized documents easy. The ADS-2200 also offers the ability to scan and retrieve files without installing any special software on the connected PC because it is recognized as a mass storage device when used with a USB flash memory drive(2), with minimal setup required on the host device. The ADS-2200 supports Windows, Mac, and Linux environments along with TWAIN, WIA for PC, ICA for Mac, and SANE drivers(3), providing the flexibility you need to support your business processes and systems.

The ADS-2200 also includes multiple image-optimization features, including background removal, multiple-feed detection, and blank page removal. A bundled software suite also includes a business card management and desktop document storage program. Users can also scan and send to email, file, image, printer, or OCR and to mobile devices(4).

(1)Color and black/white scan speed, LTR at 300dpi. See manufacturer’s website for details. (2)USB flash memory drive sold separately. (3)ISIS driver not available for Windows XP. SANE driver available for download from Brother Solutions Center. Visit manufacturer’s website. (4) Requires connection to a wireless network. See manufacturer’s website for details, availability, and mobile device compatibility.

Operating Environment: Humidity - 20% - 80%
feature_bullets: Two-sided scanning: The Brother Image center high-speed desktop document scanner can scan single or two-sided documents in a single pass at up 35 ppm(1).
50-sheet-capacity auto document feeder: Scan large-volume jobs with the ASD2200 automatic document feed with page-continuous scanning.
Multiple scan destinations: Scan quickly and submit to multiple destinations, including email, OCR, file, image, and USB flash memory drive(2).
Image-optimization features: This desktop document scanner includes multi-feed detection, background removal, blank page removal, and more.
Multiple driver support: The Brother ADS-2200 Desktop color scanner supports Windows, Mac, and Linux, along with TWAIN, WIA for PC, ICA for Mac, and SANE(3).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
